name: prospector
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who searches for gold, oil, or other valuable substances on or under the surface of the earth: a prospector looking for gold A determined prospector found diamonds in Canada's frozen northwest. See
prospect
More examplesFewer examplesProspectors have discovered titanium in many of the world's tropical areas.Like mining prospectors, they examine a golf course map and identify where they will find lost golf balls.He worked as a geologist and prospector at mineral and gemstone deposits in Madagascar.

Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or company whose job is searching for gold, oil, or other valuable substances on or under the surface of the Earth: Up to 600 prospectors have been clambering across the rugged Canadian Shield, hoping to find gold or base metals. a diamond/gold/oil prospector
